name: Doron
description:
DORON is a toy made during begining of our second year at ICAN paris.

In this strange world, unknown by many. You'll have to use your drones to fly through the cyclopean city of DORON.

Here's the link to our Game Doc (French)

Feel  free to leave a comment and i hope you'll enjoy yourself.

Created by:

  • Lucas DUPUIS - Game Designer / Sound Designer
  • Hélène MALHERBE - Game Artist / Documentation
  • Raphaël BOURGUEIL - Lead Developper
  • Odric DELAMARE - Level Designer / Documentation
